title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 22, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 22, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 2 on the World Series between the Dodgers and Rays. Why did the Dodgers use an opener last night? Why aren't starters going more than 5 innings anymore? We're joined by 3x World Series Champion Al Leiter and Host of the WhistleBlower Podcast, Tim Livingston, which takes a deeper look at Tim Donaghy, the referee at the forefront of fixing NBA games in the 90's. Plus, DP looks back at his dating life in college.... or lack thereof.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 2 on the World Series between the Dodgers and Rays. Why did the Dodgers use an opener last night? Why aren't starters going more than 5 innings anymore? We're joined by 3x World Series Champion Al Leiter and Host of the WhistleBlower Podcast, Tim Livingston, which takes a deeper look at Tim Donaghy, the referee at the forefront of fixing NBA games in the 90's. Plus, DP looks back at his dating life in college.... or lack thereof.
